about_the_game:
-This is retro classic arcade Full 3D shooting game.

The player is equipped with powerful, colorful missiles
It provides cool action to destroy the pouring enemies.
With the story of moving towards the moon
Each stage has a unique map composition and level design
It's made to provide new fun every time.
In the midst of ideological conflicts between characters
Please be the main character.

You can choose a combination of fighter jets and skills that suit your style.
Challenge and complete 43 unique stages
A target mission exists for each stage.
Enjoy the wonderful storyline from Earth to the moon.
Enjoy the battle with the giant boss
As we progress through the stage, we provide fighter jets and skills at no special cost.
Fighter and skill upgrades can help you become more powerful.
If it feels too difficult, use the slow function.
.Data is not consumed during the play.

name: Legend of the Moon 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 @ 2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Nvidia GeForce GTX 460/550, AMD Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Quad Core @ 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, AMD Radeon R7
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: -This is retro classic arcade Full 3D shooting game. The player is equipped with powerful, colorful missiles It provides cool action to destroy the pouring enemies.
